mapper.select: select other_insurance_information_id, other_insurance_information_date_begin, other_insurance_information_date_finish, other_insurance_information_name, other_insurance_information_card, other_insurance_information_email from insurance.insurance_other_insurance_information where other_insurance_information_id = #{otherInsuranceInformationId}

select other_insurance_information_id, other_insurance_information_date_begin, other_insurance_information_date_finish, other_insurance_information_name, other_insurance_information_card, other_insurance_information_email from insurance.insurance_other_insurance_information limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into insurance.insurance_other_insurance_information(other_insurance_information_date_begin, other_insurance_information_date_finish, other_insurance_information_name, other_insurance_information_card, other_insurance_information_email) values (#{otherInsuranceInformationDateBegin}, #{otherInsuranceInformationDateFinish}, #{otherInsuranceInformationName}, #{otherInsuranceInformationCard}, #{otherInsuranceInformationEmail})
mapper.update:
update insurance.insurance_other_insurance_information
other_insurance_information_date_begin = #{otherInsuranceInformationDateBegin},
other_insurance_information_date_finish = #{otherInsuranceInformationDateFinish},
other_insurance_information_name = #{otherInsuranceInformationName},
other_insurance_information_card = #{otherInsuranceInformationCard},
other_insurance_information_email = #{otherInsuranceInformationEmail},
where other_insurance_information_id = #{otherInsuranceInformationId}
